QuestData.Title: The Great Retribution
QuestData.Description: You did well against the Ashtongue Broken, $n. I have another challenge for you, should you be up to it.$B$BNot too long ago, the Sanctum of the Stars suffered a tremendous attack by Illidan's fel orcs.$B$BWe've determined it was perpetrated by the Shadowmoon orcs who occupy the Ata'mal Terrace.$B$BShow them that the Scryers are not to be trifled with.
QuestData.LogDescription: Varen the Reclaimer wants you to slay 8 Shadowmoon Slayers, 8 Shadowmoon Chosen and 4 Shadowmoon Darkweavers.$B$BCompleting quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hail, $n. What news do you bring?
QuestData.RewardText: You've gained my utmost respect today, $n.$B$BSlaying one fel orc is not an easy task. Massacring a score of them is, well... heroic.
